items.title: Tesla owners turn to ‘I bought this before we knew Elon was crazy’ bumper stickers to avoid spike in vehicle torchings
items.description: Attacks on property carrying the logo of Elon Musk's electric-car company are cropping up across the U.S. and overseas.

items.title: Nvidia: AI will need more computing power, not less
items.description: Also: Putin agrees to partial ceasefire, powerful legal team to go after Boeing.
